text: The 2024 presidential campaign of Tim Scott was a campaign for the 2024 United States presidential election by United States Senator from South Carolina Tim Scott. After winning reelection, Scott was seen as a potential 2024 challenger to former president Donald Trump's bid for the nomination. Scott announced the creation of an exploratory committee for the nomination on April 11, 2023. On May 19, 2023, Scott officially filed with the Federal Election Commission to run for president. He officially announced his candidacy on May 22. Scott suspended his campaign on November 12, 2023, due to low poll numbers. ==References== Scott, Tim
title: Tim Scott 2024 presidential campaign
